issue.title: [C++] Clean up options enums in FunctionOptions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13093](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13093). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should use a consistent and style-guide-conforming naming scheme for enums in FunctionOptions. Currently they all use upper-snake-case. There are also toplevel non-class enums.
